jobDescription: Job Description  General business intelligence and reporting job duties in support of Engineering Department. This position will use a broad base of technologies to locate, analyze and visualize Engineering data. Candidate needs to be self-driven and able to drive projects to completion. Proven project management experience and the ability to communicate is necessary to be successful in this position. Candidate needs to be strong with SQL and SAS as this will be the primary tools used. Experience with Tableau, Power BI, scripting languages and SharePoint are also helpful.  Duration  Position is currently planned until 12/31/2018, but could be extended based on department budget and contractor performance.  Tech Skills Experience with SAS, SQL and TableauExperience with scripting languagesProject management experienceExperience with Power BI or BOBJExperience with SharePoint, Excel, WordSAP Experience
